subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Analysts are calling Thursday’s N.B.A. draft a two-man event featuring Derrick Rose and Michael Beasley, with the rest of the list consisting of questionable prospects.
snippet: Analysts are calling Thursday’s N.B.A. draft a two-man event featuring Derrick Rose and Michael Beasley, with the rest of the list consisting of questionable prospects.
